column4: Will Ubuntu warn me before my HDD dies so that I can buy a new one and transfer the data over?
not sure but it does run fsck every x number of reboots, i would advise you to let this run rather than pressing esc to quite (would people agree)
I always let it run. I'm talking about HDD failue, not filesystem failure.
